data.text: @kerfufflei @DmodosCutter I can't think of anything more reckless than telling people to get infected.
@truthshamesthe6 @DmodosCutter @EnemyInAState He definitely has. He's not the first, and it is very cynical and disappointing. Money talking.

@DmodosCutter @EnemyInAState Not helped by this in the Mail. Almost like they want to finish off their elderly, Tory voting readership - genius!

@EnemyInAState I used to respect Dr Campbell but no more , he has become a danger saying omicron is mild and he contemplated whether to catch this variant as we will all get infected apparently this year . Itâ€™s irresponsible especially if he has immunosuppressed viewers .

@trendless @flowermusickids It's because he has a niche and nobody pays much attention, yet his reach is in the millions. Anybody serious is too busy doing other stuff. There are many channels like his though, and Sailor would be a Twitter equivalent on here: very little pushback I see.
@EnemyInAState Every video I've seen by him he discusses studies upon studies. These studies are all disinformation? Serious question

@flowermusickids @EnemyInAState I can't understand why there's so little pushback against his videos on here. I've seen a couple credentialed folks do so, but mostly he's untouched. I hadn't even heard of him until a month or two ago when my SIL mentioned him as her go-to resource.

He gets two huge 👎 from me
